summary: Existing deployed draft app (version 57) is the canonical baseline. Requested changes: fix word counting logic/results; limit Top Players to top 3 with expandable list on landing page; add Admin dashboard analytics for website visitors (using ipify anonymized IP, tracked only on landing page); add Admin dashboard Users section with pagination (20 per page) when more than 2 users.
architectural_notes: Use deployed version 57 as canonical baseline for changes.
Visitor tracking counted only on landing page.
Use ipify to fetch an anonymized IP identifier for unique-visitor counting.
known_issues: Build/deployment attempt failed with error: "Our AI couldn't handle that request"; user requested retry.

existing_features.title: Fix the Typing Challenge final results word counting so that typed/correct/mistyped/untyped are computed across the entire 5-level run (including when the player clicks Next to skip levels), using the definitions: typedWords = correctWords + mistypedWords; correctWords counts words where the typed word exactly matches the corresponding level paragraph word in the same order; mistypedWords counts words that were typed but are not an exact match to the corresponding paragraph word in the same order; untypedWords = totalWordsAcrossAllLevels - (correctWords + mistypedWords). Ensure the final results no longer show 0 typed/mistyped when level 1 was typed then the user advanced to the end.

On the landing page Top Players card (Login page), show only the top 3 scores by default. Add an expand/collapse control (a '^' toggle as requested) that expands the card to reveal the remaining players; collapsing returns to showing only the top 3.

Add backend support and Admin Dashboard UI for a “Website visitors” section showing: “Unique visitors today (unique as in different IPs)”, “Total visitors today”, and “Total visitors”. Visitor identity must be derived from an anonymized version of the user’s IP fetched via ipify, and visits must be counted only when the landing page is loaded.

Add backend support and Admin Dashboard UI for a “Users” section that lists all registered users by their profile names. If there are more than 2 users, paginate the list with 20 users per page and provide page navigation controls.

new_feature_requests.summary: Fix word counting results across level progression (typed/correct/mistyped/untyped logic)
Landing page Top Players: show only top 3 scores with expandable section to reveal the rest
Admin dashboard: add Website visitors analytics (Unique visitors today by anonymized IP via ipify; Total visitors today; Total visitors; counted only on landing page)
Admin dashboard: add Users section listing registered profile names; paginate if >2 users (20 users/page)

projectName: TypeFaster v57: Fix typing word-count results, landing Top Players collapse, and add Admin visitors + users sections
